verbs.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin [V: is] headed to China in " a few days " to negotiate on trade , President Donald Trump said Tuesday .
[ARG0: U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin] is [V: headed] [ARG1: to China] [ARGM-TMP: in " a few days "] [ARGM-PRP: to negotiate on trade] , President Donald Trump said Tuesday .
[ARG0: U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin] is headed to China in " a few days " to [V: negotiate] [ARG2: on trade] , President Donald Trump said Tuesday .
U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin is headed to China in " a few days " to negotiate on trade , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
